content: The Gourd can be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain, upping the uses and effectiveness. Doing this turns it into the Medicine Gourd, Healing Gourd, Medicine Sage Gourd, and Medicine Master Gourd with each upgrade.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Old Gourd'.
The content is as follows:
The Gourd can be upgraded at the Shen Monkey Vendor in Bamboo Grove in Black Wind Mountain, upping the uses and effectiveness. Doing this turns it into the Medicine Gourd, Healing Gourd, Medicine Sage Gourd, and Medicine Master Gourd with each upgrade.
